title: My Sister Confessed To Me Out Of The Blue, But How Am I Supposed To Go Out With Her? - Novel Updates
tags: Beautiful Female Lead   Brother Complex   Incest   Male Protagonist   Modern Day   Sister Complex   Younger Sisters
author: 新名天生
description:
The night before entering high school, my sister came to my room and suddenly confessed to me.

“Onii-chan, go out with me.”

The first confession in my life was from my sister...

I couldn't say no when I saw my sister's tears, so I went to the entrance ceremony with my answer on hold.

My sister who goes to the same high school as me.

How am I supposed to date my sister?

A flirtatious love comedy between a super Brocon sister with superb comic skills and her kind, normal brother who is a nobody. 

~Imagine if you could love a sister like that~


>
